mdRecord.dcterms:description: "... The school...was designed for an enrolment of 1,250. However, by the 1970s the area was experiencing urban decay, and the school's enrolment fell to under 100. The school closed in 1979...." -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scotland_Street_School_Museum [work]
